nodes.text: Lucky You was an entertainment building, that was located in the Darkside region of the planet Coruscant and it operated during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Lucky You was staffed with amateur actors and they would offer patrons an hour of make-believe. The actors would allow the patrons to pretend that they were successful or uptowners and the hope that it gave people made it one of the most popular places in Darkside.

Lucky You was owned and ran by Jeela Cthon and Geo Cthon, a young Human couple. In 19 BBY, the Dark Jedi visited Lucky You twice, to enjoy its services. A short time afterward, the Heroes of Cularin, who were trying to find him, visited it during the course of their investigations.
